comparisons.model_output: Genomic DNA was extracted using FlexiGene DNA kit (51206, Qiagen). PCR for Sanger sequencing was performed on a GeneTouch Thermal Cycler (35 cycles, 94 °C for 30 s, 60 °C for 60 s, 72 °C for 2min). Mycoplasma testing by PCR was performed using the Mycoplasma Testing Kit (#091, Media and Monoclonal Laboratories, Harry Perkins Institute of Medical Research, Fig. 1). PCR screening for reprogramming episomes was performed using primers listed in Table 2.

comparisons.model_output: Digital karyotyping using Infinium Human CoreExome-24 Beadchip SNP array showed normal diploid karyotype (46,XX) with no chromosomal rearrangements. CNV profiling demonstrated normal copy number variation.

comparisons.ground_truth: Molecular karyotyping by SNP array (Illumina Infinium HumanCoreExome-24; resolution 0.5 Mb).
comparisons.model_output: Normal diploid karyotype (46, XX) with no reprogramming induced alterations detected by digital karyotyping and CNV analysis.

comparisons.ground_truth: Karyotyping occurred at a resolution of 300bphs. Fifteen metaphase spreads were analysed.
comparisons.model_output: Normal female karyotype (46XX) with no G-banding abnormalities at passage 9. 15 metaphase spreads analysed.

comparisons.ground_truth: Molecular karyotyping by SNP array (Illumina Infinium GSA-24 v2.0). SNPduo comparison to parental cell (>99.9% identity).
comparisons.model_output: Normal karyotype confirmed by Illumina Infinium GSA-24 v2.0 SNP array at passage number P3 + 7. No differences detected between original PBMC sample and corresponding iPSC line.

comparisons.ground_truth: Karyotyping occurred at a resolution of 300bphs. Fifteen metaphase spreads were analysed.
comparisons.model_output: Normal female karyotype (46XX) with no G-banding abnormalities at passage 9. 15 metaphase spreads analysed.

comparisons.ground_truth: Molecular karyotyping by SNP array (Illumina Infinium HumanCoreExome-24; resolution 0.5 Mb).
comparisons.model_output: Normal diploid karyotype (46, XX) with no reprogramming induced alterations detected by digital karyotyping and copy number variation profiling.

comparisons.ground_truth: Molecular karyotyping by SNP array (resolution 0.5 Mb). SNPduo comparison to parental cell (>99.9% identity).
comparisons.model_output: G-Band karyotyping confirmed the absence of chromosomal abnormalities in the edited iPSC line. 20 metaphase cells counted. SNP array revealed no aneuploidies or large deletions or insertions.
